Stayed @ ITC Grand Chola for 4N/5D during July 2025 while on a business trip to Chennai.

Impressed by the grand architecture, property amenities (600+ rooms, services apartments, many restaurants with specialised cuisine, swimming pool, spa, lounge, wellness centre / gym, etc.), sprawling lawns, spacious rooms, artisanal ice-cream place, fabelle chocolates store and courteous staff!
There were multiple specialty restaurants from Indian to Pan Asian, Indian, Italian, and more.

On all the 5 days, the breakfast buffet was a highlight-lavish, well-balanced with South/North Indian and Western options. The dinner spread, while decent, leaned more heavily on Indian options.

One suggestion: While items are clearly labelled with allergen info, I expected clearer separation between vegetarian and non-vegetarian items, especially for people with allergies. For instance, pancakes (with egg) and eggless waffles were placed side by side, with a shared serving tong - increases cross contamination risks. As someone with a severe egg allergy, this was very concerning for me. While the staff always prepared fresh waffles for me on request, the arrangement / layout of dishes didnt change over the 5 days I had breakfast - i expect better allergen awareness and caution from a luxury property.

Special mention to Sayantan @ front desk for a smooth experience, Susmita for her personal touch / calls about my experience, Abhisek who served us (during dinner on 7/10). Thanks team!

Overall, it was a memorable stay - but a bit more attention to detail and timely accommodation of guest requests would elevate the experience further!

Room was comfortable and sufficiently spacious. The hotel has a Chola style architecture and sculptures on the inside - really good ambience. The hotel provided complimentary banana chips made in coconut oil which were really nice. Service was excellent. Swimming pool and gym facilities were well kept.
Was here for an office event. Food services were decent, beverages were really good.
Overall, it was a pleasant stay.

My stay at ITC Grand Chola in Chennai was an exceptional experience, marked by luxury, comfort, and world-class hospitality. The rooms were truly opulent spacious, elegantly designed, and equipped with every modern amenity one could ask for. From the plush bedding to the high-tech in-room controls, every detail reflected attention to luxury and convenience. The blend of traditional South Indian architecture with contemporary touches made the space feel both grand and welcoming.

One of the absolute highlights of my stay was the food. Every meal was a culinary delight. The variety and richness of flavors across their multiple in-house restaurants were simply outstanding. Whether it was the lavish South Indian breakfast spread, authentic Chettinad cuisine, or the perfectly cooked international dishes, everything was fresh, beautifully presented, and absolutely delicious. The service at the dining venues was equally impeccable warm, attentive, and knowledgeable staff who went out of their way to make sure we had the best experience.

The overall ambience of the property from the stunning lobby to the serene pool area and grand corridors exudes elegance. It‚Äôs clear that this hotel doesn‚Äôt just provide accommodation but a luxurious experience rooted in Indian hospitality.

Highly recommended for anyone visiting Chennai, whether for business or leisure.

Been staying here couple times a year for the past 10 odd years. Love the hotel, we always stay in the North tower, rooms are nicely laid out. The breakfast offerings are exceptional.  Sadly  noticing a deterioration in staff responsiveness and demeanor. Perhaps the hotel is now too busy, the receptionist rarely connect or have a smile. The room furnishings especially towels are not fresh looking anymore and are also threadbare.

ITC Grand Chola, Chennai

ITC Grand Chola is a true luxury property with a grand presence. While the rooms offered comfort, the ambience felt somewhat subdued due to the dark-colored furniture and d√©cor, which made it a bit challenging to fully relax.

On the culinary front, the experience was truly exceptional. The dining options were remarkable, and we thoroughly enjoyed the flavorful, finger-licking dishes that ITC Hotels are renowned for. Overall, a memorable stay with standout dining experiences, though the room ambience could benefit from a lighter, more relaxing touch.

One of a few 7 star hotels in Chennai. Located near the sea, the ambience is quiet and relaxing. Maintenance is very good and as a customer we cannot ask for more. The staff need to be given some orientation and detailing of day-to-day activities so that customers are not left searching. Special instructions should be given to staff to address the questions of customers who look "simple" and are not "so informed". Food quality of South Indian dishes is ok. Needs  improvement to meet the standards of gourmets. :) Parking is plenty and the drivers are helpful.

Me and my teenage  son I have been staying at The Leela Palace Chennai for the past week, his very first visit to India and it has truly been a special and unforgettable experience for both of us.
The warmth, professionalism, and thoughtful touches throughout our stay have far exceeded our expectations. We‚Äôve been fortunate to stay at exceptional hotels across the globe, but The Leela Chennai has genuinely redefined what service and customer experience can be.This hotel sets the bar incredibly high. From the beautifully maintained spaces to the consistently kind and attentive staff, every detail reflects a deep commitment to excellence and hospitality.
Thank you for creating a place that feels so special. We will carry this experience with us for a long time.

Truly a 5 star experience indeed. Customer experience at its finest, such a special hotel, screams class and elegance. Pool area is very pretty at night, its a classic hotel yet has a modern touch to it. Breakfast buffet and dinner buffet @ Spectra is something I enjoyed so much. I managed be a part of the South Indian special week this past Monday, enjoyed every single menu on it. Room comes with a bathtub, perfect to relax, chill and take a break from the Chennai chaos. And of course the staff that attended us was such a warm soul, Ekalaviya ( not sure if its the correct spelling.

We sincerely thank Leela Place and the entire team for providing us with luxurious accommodations and exceptional service. Thanks for a pleasant swimming pool atmosphere and chemical free environment The delicious cuisines truly reflect the chefs‚Äô commitment to delivering an authentic touch to both international and local dishes. A special round of applause goes to the polite, calm, and honest staffs who patiently addressed all our requests. Overall, my family and I had an unforgettable royal experience.

Went here for a team dinner. The vibes here are too good. Loved the hospitality service right from parking till the restaurant. The aesthetics I think no one needs to mention how beautiful those are. Overall a very good experience here. Must try the set menus if going for dining, the taste was superb. Good for family, friends or couples.

Staff at the reception and at the restaurant very cooperative .
Ambiance of the hotel is very very good .
Location is very convenient and not that far from the Airport and it is well connected by almost all mode of public transportation.
In the case of early departure ,we were given breakfast parcel by 7 am @ very short notice on previous evening.

Suggestion to the hotel management :

(1) To avoid any mishap ,especially to the Senior Citizen guests ,it will be better if steel bar is conveniently  fixed in the bathroom cum fresh room .
(2) As the Women  Hostel is there in front of the hotel , to maintain the privacy ,if will be better if the thick  curtains with the linings ,are fitted instead of  not that thick curtains already fitted .
Thanks

"Hotel Madras Grand is a perfect choice for families ‚Äì clean, safe, and welcoming with excellent service and a comfortable stay."

The staff are warm and helpful, especially the front office team who make check-in smooth and welcoming.

Excellent service ‚Äì the front office staff are polite, professional, and always ready to help.

Friendly and attentive staff, with the front office team giving an especially pleasant experience.

We stayed here for two night, and the experience was disappointing. The surrounding area is quite dirty, and the 3bhk was very good but filled with mosquitoes
The front desk staff were not welcoming, making the stay feel like a complete waste.especially the lady and needs to be trained

It's a nice peaceful hotel with nice rooms,
Service is really fast and very understanding people.
Since I have come with my family in the car, there isn't much parking space, I wish it had more. Plus my grandmother can't climb stairs unless someone holds her or there is a rod near the stairs, which is not provided, hopefully next time when we come there will be a rod next to the stairs for my grandmother to climb easily.
Or else everything is well and good.

Very good stay at madras grand with my parents. Helpful staff, and responsive. We booked a twin room but we were upgraded to a double bed twin room which made our stay much comfortable. Will definitely recommend staying here. Quite accessible to all the main spots, especially in anna nagar.

I stayed in Lemon tree hotel for a night and the stay was amazing. The hotel is little bit drive from the airport, but closer to mall and the city. Overall, the stay was nice with rooms being neat and clean , service was top notch. To add, morning breakfast was great with plenty of vegetarian options. Highly recommend!

Booked the hotel for a short nap and was welcomed with loud bangs and drilling sound due to on-going work. Wouldn't recommend anyone until all the works are completed .

Couldn't keep the blinds open as they were working on the facade as well , nothing was told while checking-in as a courtesy regarding the on-going work. Worst experience.

I had a very pleasant day at Lemon Tree Hotel, Chennai. The location is excellent‚Äîclose to the airport, IT parks, and main city spots which made it easier for us to reach the location without hassle.The staff were courteous, professional, and always ready to help, which made the experience even better.

We went for a breakfast buffet which had a good variety of options, and the food quality was impressive. The team ensured to make us comfortable to taste or favorites without hesitation br serving hot dosa from live counter where I make a special mention to the chef who also chef the south indian dishes.The dining space was calm,neat and well-maintained. Overall, it‚Äôs a great place for a Nice buffet experience. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Chennai.

Five-Star Experience at Lemon Tree Hotel, Guindy!
I recently stayed at Lemon Tree Hotel in Guindy with my life partner, and it was a truly wonderful experience. From the moment we checked in, we felt safe and secure‚Äîsomething that really matters when traveling as a couple.

The swimming pool was clean and well-maintained, perfect for a relaxing dip. The reception staff, especially the girls, were very welcoming and helpful. A special shout-out to Mr. Mohan at the front office‚Äîhis warm and friendly attitude made us feel right at home.

Thanks to the amazing service and hospitality, we‚Äôre already looking forward to visiting again and again. Highly recommended!

I had a wonderful and comfortable stay at Lemon Tree. A special thanks to Ms. Anisha for assisting me with an early check-in so smoothly and without any hassle. Her warm and professional approach truly made a difference. Thank you, Lemon Tree, for the excellent hospitality! ‚ú®

I had a wonderful stay here - everything was smooth and seamless. The hotel is beautiful, the atmosphere welcoming and elegant, staff are gracious. They are just a few minutes away from the airport and offer transportation and a soft landing after a long flight. Very nice gym and pool. This will be my go-to place when in Chennai.

Had a great stay at this hotel located just minutes from the airport. All the staff were warm, smiling and helpful, including Marralisa at the lobby and Chris (chef) at Cinnamon restaurant. Hotel was clean, gym and pool in good working condition. Would love to be back someday.

Trident Chennai is a great place to stay if you want to be close to the airport. Their staff is amongst the best in the industry. Extremely helpful and very courteous. We had a situation when we stayed with them (no fault on the hotel, It was our mistake) and the staff handled it so professionally. Their team went out of their way to ensure that our comfort and wellness. A big shout out to their lobby manager Lisa and her entire team, including Arushi. With a very personal touch, they ensured that we felt at home and taken care of every single minute. Trident‚Äôs restaurant staff is equally amazing. Always willing to accommodate any request and very energetic. Overall a great experience and would definitely recommend if you want a comfortable stay and lasting good memory of Chennai and its wonderful people.

Had a wonderful stay at Trident Hotel, Chennai!
The interiors are beautifully done - elegant and calming from the moment you walk in.
The rooms were clean, tidy, and very comfortable.
The breakfast buffet was delicious with a wide variety of options. In-room dining was excellent - meals arrived on time, fresh, and piping hot.

What stood out the most was the warm, welcoming staff who made the entire experience feel special. Truly great hospitality with attention to every detail!

Located in one of the best neighborhoods of Chennai, on Grand Southern highway connecting to the international airport. The hotel staff is very welcoming and friendly, makes you feel at home and guide you on everything during the stay. The buffet breakfast served at their Cinnamon restaurant is one of the best that I had eaten. Their transport staff is very accommodating for pickup and drop locations. I had a good experience and comfortable stay. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like was the AC settings in the room. I turned the AC on 19 yet it didn‚Äôt feel cool enough and the tv didn‚Äôt have enough channels either. None of the subscription services were active either.

Decent size spacious rooms with equally courteous staff.
Breakfast buffet spread is good but the taste is just about average. The eggs and the pancakes are your best bet, perhaps.
The location is alright, near to the beach but a very busy junction near by

One of the good place to stay at Chennai which is close to US consulate. The service is very very good, rooms are pretty decent and having a great view from the window wall. However, the only thing I disappointed is food. The traditional Indian food that I ordered isn‚Äôt good, especially the food that goes easy every where which is Biryani.

Rooms are very spacious and maintained well. Staff‚Äôs are very friendly and provided great service. I‚Äôd like to mention specifically Mr. Chandru from housekeeping for his care to us throughout our stay. Location is just right for my purpose of visit

Had a pleasant and peaceful stay at Radisson Blu Hotel City Centre, Chennai. The overall ambiance of the hotel was calm and relaxing, making it a great place to unwind. The amenities provided were good and well-maintained, adding to the comfort of the stay. The food was decent, though it could definitely be improved in terms of variety and taste. The pool area was nice, but I felt it could be a little broader to make the experience more enjoyable. One area that stood out for improvement was the behavior of the L2 staff, especially during the breakfast buffet at Oasis‚Äîa little more grounded and courteous approach would make the experience even better. Overall, it was a comfortable stay with a few areas that could be enhanced.

Thanks ver all the service of this Radisson Blue facility was very good.
Ms Jayati interaction and behaviour towards improving business was very good.
The Restaurant Oasis is very good wet food quality, behaviour of staff, condition of food, ambient.
It‚Äôs worth staying in this hotel.

The stay was okay overall, obviously not worth the price, the rooms definitely need improvement. The shower and TV could be upgraded for a more comfortable experience. The breakfast menu also needs better variety and taste. With some upgrades, the hotel could offer a much better stay.

I liked the overall service provided, the staff was polite and the amenities were top-notch. I would definitely recommend it to other people who are headed for their VISA interviews. The shuttle service was a god-send, appreciate the efforts of the team in setting this up. It would be a 10 if the food quality was better. Some dishes like grilled chicken cooking could be improved. But staff was happy to change the dish to my preference.

Avoid this hotel unless location is your only priority.

Stayed at Ibis Chennai City Centre for 9 nights ‚Äî and it was a very disappointing experience. The A/C is locked at 24¬∞C, and the cooling was terrible throughout our stay. No help with luggage, even during check-in or check-out. What made it worse was the rude and unhelpful reception staff ‚Äî zero customer service.

The only good thing was the location ‚Äî great for shopping and restaurants. But that alone doesn‚Äôt make up for the poor service, discomfort, and lack of basic facilities. Definitely not worth the price. Look elsewhere if you want a comfortable and respectful stay.

We are planning to stay  at this hotel for more than a week. It‚Äôs just been couple of days and we already are impressed with the service and the staff are very welcoming and really helpful.
The breakfast buffet is the best with all the extraordinarily tasting South Indian food item and also the diverse options are wonderful.
I highly recommend this place!

Stay:
My stay was good and the staff was well mannered and polite.
Had some electrical issue in my room but the experts looked into the issue and resolved it quickly.

Food:
The breakfast spread was decent. The arrangement looked a bit chaotic but the staff was getting things done like a pro.

Over all Good stay! Will visit again.

We arrived in Chennai in March 2025 and had a very enjoyable stay in this hotel. Service was excellent. Many options for food and drinks as they had about three restaurants within. Breakfast and dinner spread was so varied and widespread; great choices for non vegetarians (their mutton curry with thosai was amazing ) that which we did not enjoy in other hotels that we stayed on our two week trip to Trichy, Pondicherry, Goa and Cochin. Chennai GRT outdid even the Taj Fort Aquada in Goa by leaps and bounds in every aspect; service, ambience, rooms, fast lifts, food and driver‚Äôs parking.
As for service we wish to mention:
Kathir , Restaurant Manager & Sathish, Senior Executive, who were ever so attentive to both my husband every time  we were in the restaurant for our meals. My husband, who is English, wasn‚Äôt familiar with the various Indian dishes and had his preferences but they were so caring and ensured his every request was catered to. It is senior management such as them who enhance the experience for us customers and keep us coming back.
We want to thank Aparajita, Reception Staff who checked us in so smoothly and gave a few gift cards to enjoy in the hotel. Aparajita even walked us to the room to ensure it met with our comfort.She was very engaging, soft spoken, charming and stopped to check on us any time she met us in the foyer.
All in all we hardly had any meals outside of this hotel as hygiene was our priority and GRT, Chennai met that. If we visit Chennai again, this definitely be where we will stay!

Chandrika & Peter Nelson from Malaysia.

text:
This 5 star hotel is located on the main road and it is easy to find the place. They have well trained staff who will guide you from parking to other services in the hotel.
I have visited this place for the conference and the banquet hall is big and can accommodate 100-150 people . There is good space and the refreshment as sugarcane juice is served. The water bottles were placed on each table . The food is served near the banquet hall and they have a good variety of vegetarian dishes in the buffet and 2-3 items in non vegetarian. The food is good and the staff were on their toes to serve the same .
The dessert counter is also good.
Overall a good place to attend a conference and have dinner.

I had stayed at GRT Regency hotel for one day. Room was Superior category. It was spacious comfortably adequate for a family of 4. Everything in the room was in order and they had a nice gesture of keeping fruits and savoury as welcome snack. Fixtures in the bathroom were clean and effective. I had only breakfast and it was excellent with very good taste. Staff service was exceptional. They were polite and welcoming. I am also impressed with the sustainability initiatives the fuel is undertaking. Overall, a pleasant stay and I strongly recommend this hotel.

Usually not the place I used to stay when I visit chennai but as it was a short visit and I did not want to disturb my relatives or friends decided to stay here.

Pretty good rooms, considering Chennai is still not up to the 5 star standards in international level I would say they are doing a pretty good job.

Services should be improved a bit, staffs are actually really good and have very good energy. Things I usually don't see in Indian hotels is the bright smile or energy with the people but this hotel is one of those exceptions.

Our stay at Grand Chennai by GRT Hotels was nothing short of exceptional.
From the moment we arrived until the moment we left, everything exceeded our expectations.

The staff were truly outstanding ‚Äì warm, professional, and always ready to help with a smile. They made us feel genuinely welcome, like we were part of a family.
The cleanliness was impeccable. Every corner of the hotel was spotless and fresh.
The food was simply amazing ‚Äì flavorful, varied, and beautifully presented. Every meal was a delight!

What truly touched our hearts was how attached our children became to the place.
When we told them it was time to leave, they were genuinely sad ‚Äì they didn‚Äôt want to go! That says more than words ever could about how special this hotel is.

Thank you to everyone at Grand Chennai by GRT Hotels for creating such a beautiful experience.
You‚Äôve raised the bar for hospitality, and we look forward to returning again, God willing.

With heartfelt gratitude,
Jamal & Family

I had a wonderful dining experience at GRT Radisson Blu. From the moment we walked in, the staff made us feel extremely welcome with their warm hospitality and attentive service. They were courteous, professional, and ensured that every detail was taken care of.

The food was exceptional ‚Äì each dish was prepared with great care, beautifully presented, and full of flavor. The spread offered a perfect balance of variety and quality, making it a delight for every palate.

The ambience added to the experience ‚Äì elegant, calm, and thoughtfully designed to make dining both comfortable and memorable. Whether for a casual meal or a special occasion, the atmosphere truly enhances the experience.

Overall, a perfect spot for a fine dining outing. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for great food, impeccable service, and a lovely ambience.

We enjoyed our stay in this wonderful hotel. We stayed in the business suite which had an amazing jacuzzi bath which my child truly made the most of. The breakfast buffet with his numerous live kitchens and spread was a good start to the day. I will truly recommend this place of you are here in Chennai or flying out from the airport.

Wonderful experience and amazing staff. Rooms are extremely comfortable, clean and equipped with the latest technology.
Breakfast is varied, very good, and here too the staff makes the difference.
the pool bar will offer you delicious cocktails but most of all the dinner at the ‚ÄúKebab Factory‚Äù restaurant. This is something you must try.  Vegetarian/and not tasting and of typical Indian dishes. Here too we had a lot of fun with the staff who were friendly but professional! in short you absolutely have to come to this hotel!

I stepped into this hotel on the wings of duty, carrying the breeze of CBSE responsibilities. Yet, what awaited me was a symphony of elegance. Every pillar here stands like a poet‚Äôs verse, and each wall whispers tales of artistry, as if the building itself wears a crown of grandeur. The architecture rises like a fortress of dreams, making me feel as though I have crossed into another land. The air is scented with purity; the floors shine like mirrors of care. The staff, with their warm smiles and graceful manners, are the true heartbeat of this palace of hospitality.

We stayed at Radisson Blu near Airport Road, Chennai & had a wonderful experience. Thanks to the team for the free upgrade to a suite ‚Äì it made our stay extra special üòç

We also visited The Great Kebab Factory inside the Radisson blue GRT hotel, &  it was an absolute delight. The variety of kebabs was impressive, & each one was delicious. A special thanks to RINSA & GEETHA & the entire team of waiters for their warm hospitality ‚Äì they were polite, attentive, & made our dining experience memorable.

Highly recommend this restaurant if you‚Äôre a food lover, especially for kebabs. Definitely worth a visit!

Don't even think/assume it is 5 star hotel. It is more like a upscale 3 star hotel.

I booked online and I didn't get the room type I preferred.

There is some kind of stench in the room floors/corridors. And there is no AC on corridors.

They charge like 5 star and service is like 3 star only.

Better find a branded hotel and stay there

Only thing I appreciate is 65 inch TV in the room. It is LG make, so don't expect superb sound

Very good location for airport travel passengers.
Good vegetarian food.
Value for money.

It's surprise to hear from the reception that there is no facilities for the  car drivers to take rest in the night. Please make necessary arrangements for the customer own car drivers who is also an important person while selecting the hotels by the customer.

Some maintenance is needed. The floors have an aged scent and appear to be worn. Refurbishment is necessary. The staff is courteous, and the location is excellent. The rates are also quite reasonable. However, maintenance or improvement is definitely required.

Hotel Review: Disappointing Experience ‚Äì Not Worth the Five-Star Tag

I recently stayed at this hotel for two nights, expecting a true five-star experience based on its classification and pricing. Unfortunately, it fell far short of expectations in almost every aspect.

Despite the high price, the services and amenities felt more like a three-star property. There was no lounge area, no lawn space, and no spa, which are basic features you'd expect from any upscale hotel. The room itself was quite compact, and to make matters worse, the mini-fridge wasn‚Äôt working. I informed the staff two to three times, but it was never resolved during my stay.

Basic necessities were also missing‚Äîno hand towels were provided, and the food quality was subpar. The buffet for breakfast, lunch, and dinner lacked variety and taste, making dining a rather disappointing experience.

Overall, the hotel does not live up to its five-star status. With its limited amenities, lack of attention to guest concerns, and poor food quality, I would rate it more accurately as a three-star property. Definitely not worth the premium pricing.

Only good thing is behavior of staff, very polite and courteous.

It lives by the name, very nice and fully equipped hotel provides most of the amenities required for a business hotel. Rooms are spacious and comfortable. Bath area are sufficiently sized and fully furnished with required toiletries. Service staff is polite and respectful. Location of hotel is
strategically placed close to airport and city areas as well making it ideal place to stay.
I really had good stay.

The Park Hotel Chennai is an excellent choice if you are visiting the city for a US visa appointment. Its most significant advantage is its location, it is just a short walk or a 2-minute drive from the US Consulate and the Visa Application Center, making it incredibly convenient for visa-related work. The proximity reduces travel stress on the day of the appointment. The highlight is hotel‚Äôs clean and comfortable rooms, supportive and prompt staff, and good amenities such as spa services, pool, and on-site dining. The property‚Äôs ambience is modern yet welcoming, and the staff are known to be helpful, which can be especially comforting during a possibly tense visa trip. If you‚Äôre traveling for visa appointments, then i would say it‚Äôs ‚Äúworth every money spent.‚Äù

Overall, for those needing to visit the Consulate, The Park Chennai offers a hassle-free and comfortable experience, and its location is one of the best you will find for this purpose.

Stayed at The Park Hotel Chennai for the first time and it was a truly delightful experience. The hotel perfectly blends luxury with comfort. From the moment I checked in, the staff was courteous and attentive, making me feel instantly welcomed.

The room was spotless, well-furnished, and had all the modern amenities one would expect from a 5-star property. The location is excellent ‚Äî centrally placed, making it easy to access major spots in the city. The in-house restaurants offered a wide variety of cuisines, and every meal was a treat!

Highly recommend this hotel for both business and leisure travelers. Exceptional hospitality, stylish interiors, and a peaceful atmosphere ‚Äî The Park Chennai definitely lives up to its reputation.

The Park Chennai is a stylish boutique hotel blending modern luxury with cinematic heritage. Its central Anna Salai location makes it perfect for both business and leisure travelers. Guests enjoy chic rooms, diverse dining options, and a vibrant nightlife at Pasha and The Leather Bar. The rooftop pool and Aura spa add to its indulgent appeal. While some mention smaller rooms or noise, the service and ambience consistently impress.

Our stay at the property was truly enjoyable and exceeded expectations. The hospitality and service were commendable, and we would like to extend our special thanks to Ms. Catherine and Ms. Sujitha at the reception for their warm welcome and consistent support throughout our stay. Their professionalism and attentiveness made a positive difference in our experience.

The only suggestion for improvement would be regarding the cleanliness and maintenance of the toilet area, as we noticed an occasional foul smell. Additionally, it would be helpful to place dry floor mats at the bathroom entrance to ensure better hygiene and safety. Implementing these small changes would further enhance the overall guest experience.

Had an amazing experience at the Park for their lunch buffet! The spread was extensive with a great mix of cuisines ‚Äì from fresh salads and appetizers to hearty mains and indulgent desserts. Every dish was well-prepared and flavorful. The ambiance was elegant yet comfortable, making it perfect for a relaxed afternoon meal.

Special mention to Imran for his exceptional service ‚Äì he was attentive, warm, and made sure our table had everything we needed. His hospitality really elevated the entire dining experience.

The staff overall were polite and professional, and the live counters were a highlight. The presentation of the dishes added a premium touch.

Excellent value for money and a must-visit for anyone who enjoys a wide variety of quality food in a classy setting. Will definitely come back!

My stay at this hotel was extremely pleasant. The rooms were clean, spacious, and well-kept with a comfortable atmosphere. The staff were courteous and very supportive, making sure all my requirements were taken care of without any delay. The service was smooth from check-in to check-out, which made the entire experience stress-free.

I recently stayed at the Hyatt Regency Chennai, and it was a wonderful experience! The hotel has a modern and luxurious feel, with spacious, well-appointed rooms and comfortable beds. The staff were attentive and courteous, always willing to help with any requests.

The breakfast buffet offered a great variety of dishes, both Indian and continental, and the quality of the food was excellent. The swimming pool area is also lovely, providing a relaxing atmosphere in the heart of the city.

The location is perfect‚Äîclose to the city‚Äôs main attractions and easily accessible from the airport. Whether you‚Äôre in Chennai for business or leisure, I‚Äôd definitely recommend Hyatt Regency Chennai for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

An outstanding experience from start to finish at the Hyatt Regency Chennai!

The hotel is in a prime location ‚Äî central, convenient, and easy to get around. The property itself is spacious, clean, and very well maintained, with a strong sense of safety and comfort throughout.

The rooms are large, spotless, and thoughtfully designed, making for a truly relaxing stay. The dining options are fantastic, with multiple restaurants offering a great variety of delicious cuisines. The bar area is a great highlight, with live performances and a vibrant yet classy atmosphere that adds to the overall experience.

I also made use of the spa and gym facilities, both of which are top-notch. The spa services were excellent, and the gym is well-equipped and clean ‚Äî perfect for staying on track while traveling.

What truly sets this hotel apart is the team of people working here. Every single staff member I interacted with ‚Äî from the general manager and front desk team, to the concierge, waitresses, housekeeping staff, security guards, chefs, and kitchen team ‚Äî was courteous, professional, and genuinely warm. You can tell there is a real culture of hospitality here. Everyone made an effort to ensure guests feel welcome, comfortable, and well cared for.

A big thank you to everyone at the Hyatt Regency Chennai for making my stay so memorable. Highly recommended whether you‚Äôre here for business or leisure!

Very good hospitality, clean and comfortable rooms and a smooth stay at Hyatt. Me and my wife stayed here for two nights,  and attended a visa interview. Very good location for US consulate related travels. Special thanks to Aishwarya for the warm and friendly reception and hospitality!

I visited here in Aug‚Äô25. Had a very bad experience. Room had very foul smell. They put some freshener, after an hour when I entered again there was very bad smell. Infact bed, pillow and blanket also had very bad smell that I could not even sleep. They changed it around 11pm. But still the smell in the room was not sorted.
Most disappointing part was - Toilet was already used by someone.

I thought the smell was only in my room. I checked with my colleague who was on the same floor, even he raised the same complain.
Next day in the morning, we just changed the hotel.

I had a wonderful experience at Hilton Chennai. The staff were incredibly friendly, attentive, and always ready to help. The room was clean, spacious, and well-maintained, with all the amenities I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfect, close to Metro, making it easy to explore the area. The food at the restaurant was delicious, with a variety of options to choose from. Overall, it was a relaxing and memorable stay. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone and look forward to coming back again.

I‚Äôm a longtime fan of Hilton Hotels, and our stay at Hilton Chennai was truly memorable! Although our visit was a little while ago, I felt it deserved a review on a platform like Google because of the exceptional experience we had.

Highlights from our stay:

* The breakfast buffet at Vasco‚Äôs was absolutely superb! The food was delicious, and the ambiance of the restaurant was warm and inviting. A special thank you to Executive Chef Shibu for his hospitality and for making us feel so welcome.
* The rooms were spacious, incredibly comfortable, and always smelled fresh ‚Äî such a lovely touch that made our stay even more enjoyable.
* We especially loved the outdoor terrace in the evenings. My husband and I would unwind there with some amazing mocktails and great music ‚Äî it quickly became our favorite spot.
* The Front Desk team was fantastic and went out of their way to assist us during check-in, especially since we were traveling with my elderly father and had a few special requests. Their care and professionalism really stood out.
* Location is good though there are no restaurants or malls immediately outside the hotel

Hilton Chennai truly knows how to make guests feel special, thanks to a team that embodies the true spirit of hospitality ‚Äî warm, courteous, and attentive.

Note: My review comes a bit after our stay, so some aspects may have changed since then ‚Äî but the wonderful memories remain just as vivid!

The highlight of my stay at Hilton chennai  was definitely the staff. Every single person I met ‚Äî from the reception to housekeeping and restaurant team ‚Äî was warm, polite, and genuinely eager to make my stay comfortable. They went above and beyond to assist with my requests, always with a smile. It truly felt like they cared about each guest. Their hospitality made my trip special, and I‚Äôm grateful for the kindness and professionalism they showed. I will happily recommend this hotel to friends and family.

"I had the pleasure of being served by GOURAB.during my stay at Hilton Chennai, and their service was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I entered the restaurant, they greeted me warmly and made me feel truly welcome. Every dish was served with attention to detail, and they patiently explained the menu, offering thoughtful recommendations that perfectly matched my taste. Their attentiveness was remarkable ‚Äî topping up water without being asked, checking in just the right amount, and always wearing a genuine smile. It‚Äôs rare to find someone who blends professionalism with such warmth and passion for their work. He turned an ordinary meal into a memorable dining experience, and they are a true credit to the hotel."

text:
We visited Hilton for a team dinner and had a fantastic experience! The ambiance was elegant and welcoming, perfect for a team outing. The food was delicious with a great variety, and everything was well presented.

A special thanks to Yogi and Tarun from the staff‚Äîthey were incredibly attentive, friendly, and made sure everything ran smoothly for our group. Their service really stood out and added a personal touch to the evening.

Highly recommend Hilton for group gatherings or team dinners. Great food, excellent service, and a memorable experience overall!

The hotel was spotless and well-maintained, with a good variety of breakfast options to choose from. Its location is excellent‚Äîjust a short distance from the World Trade Center and with easy access to public and private transportation as well making getting around very convenient.

Overall, I had a wonderful stay and would definitely recommend it.

The hotel is nice and well situated. The staff are attentive and are eager to please, but can be a little slow sometimes. The rooms were of a good size and were maintained well. I did have to call housekeeping 3 times to clear up mess left by the previous tenant, but this may have been down to the language barrier as I feel they did not understand. Breakfasts were good where Paul and Randeep (the waiters) were very attentive. The gym was small but well maintained and sufficient for a good workout. The swimming pool looked good but nowhere did it state you have to take a towel from the room. There are also no changing rooms other than the toilets adjacent to the pool which were not ideal. All round ok hotel and would reuse
The experience is wholesome, had a great time with colleagues(team lunch). Service was very nice special mention for Suroj. And food was too good, especially non veg was too delicious.

My parents recently stayed at Holiday Inn Chennai for the second time, and once again, they had a truly delightful experience. From the moment they checked in, the staff made them feel welcome and well taken care of. The room was clean, spacious, and comfortable - just perfect for a relaxing stay.

A big shoutout to Philip and Pranav, who were especially accommodating and friendly throughout their stay. Their warm hospitality really stood out and made the experience even more pleasant. It‚Äôs the thoughtful service like this that keeps us coming back.

Thank you to the entire team at Holiday Inn Chennai for making their visit so enjoyable once again. Looking forward to many more stays in the future!

Altogether, the service at Holiday Inn is commendable ‚Äî everything ran smoothly and comfortably throughout our stay. A special word of appreciation goes to the dining staff, led by Mr. Rohit ‚Äî truly outstanding! Their attention to detail, warmth, and willingness to cater to our every need made our experience extra special.

We also appreciated the prompt and thoughtful support with wheelchair access, which made mobility much easier. However, a few of the wheelchairs could use some maintenance to ensure continued comfort and safety.

Heartfelt thanks to the entire team for going the extra mile ‚ù§Ô∏è

We stayed at *Upar* from April 4th to 10th and had a truly wonderful experience!

From the moment we arrived, the hospitality stood out. Special thanks to *Ms. Usha, **Mr. Balaji, and the **head chef* for going above and beyond to make our stay so comfortable. They were incredibly kind, attentive, and genuinely caring ‚Äî we felt very well looked after.

When we had a minor AC issue in our first room, the staff handled it immediately and moved us to a new room without any hassle. Everyone we interacted with was professional, thoughtful, and always eager to help.

A couple of suggestions to make the experience even better:
- A bit more variety in the *menu* would be great.
- Including *shower caps* in the bathroom amenities would be a nice touch.

Overall, a seamless and relaxing stay. Highly recommend Upar for anyone looking for a warm, welcoming place with exceptional service. We‚Äôd definitely¬†return!

A wonderful property in the heart of the city available at a very affordable rate.
We stayed there with friends.
Had nice stay, Good moderately spacious rooms and clean washrooms.
Good for both business and casual stay.
The restaurant menu is minimal and works for Complimentary BF and Al a carte Dinner only.

A good place to stay!

The worst experience I‚Äôve ever had. No hygiene whatsoever, no hand towels, no facial tissues, basic requirements aren‚Äôt there. Spotted a gecko and a cockroach in my room shows how little they care about guests. They only fleece you. Pest control isn‚Äôt even a thing here according to the staff‚Äôs attitude. Very poor management even though they charge you quite a bit. I‚Äôd strongly advise against booking this property.

The rooms are not great, looking at pictures online it looks good but reality is different. I saw a cockroach also under the bed. Cleanliness could have been lot better. Only good thing is the location, it's 10 min walk from the vac center so if you come for visa this might be a great location but overall not good for stay.

Overall the stay was good, specially the breakfast buffet. Staff at the kitchen was also very good and warm. Only reason we are giving 1 star less, is because we had to the keep returning and asking for the Press Iron - feel that could have been managed better by the hotel. And also rooms should have mini fridge.

I had a comfortable stay at the hotel. The rooms were pleasant and well-maintained, offering a good overall experience. The food was decent, though not exceptional. One area that could use improvement is the service speed‚Äîstaff were slightly slow at times.

That said, the hotel still provides a solid 5-star experience and is definitely value for money. A good place to stay if you're looking for comfort and 5 star experience at good price.

Great location. Heritage kind of vibe. Helpful staff. Breakfast spread is amazing. The ac kind of was tripping at night time. Mosquitos in the room so u need to be careful if leaving the door open. Wonderful stay otherwise.

Excellent hotel, great staff, bar, restaurants and pool. The buffet breakfast is fantastic. Only criticism is: be aware that the coffee is quite bad, which is true at every Taj. You can order in better coffee from a local cafe.

Loved every moment of the stay!
It was a great experience staying in Taj Connemara, Chennai. The room was very spacious and spotless. All staff were extremely professional and friendly. Breakfast was very good with plenty of choices.
Special thanks to Shaji in the restaurant for your professionalism and help.

Had been to the ball room for a function. The hall was decent as can be expected in any other Good hotel. But the biggest takeaway was the buffet serving. Rarely do you get South Indian food served so tasty in a 5 star. Kudos.

I had a great experience staying at ibis Chennai Sipcot. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and the location was very convenient. Everything I needed was available.

What made my stay even better was the amazing staff. Everyone was polite, helpful, and always had a smile. Special thanks to the front desk team for being so supportive and making me feel welcome. I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend this hotel to others

We had a great experience here! The food was delicious, especially the Indian dishes like idly and dosa. There were also other cuisines available, including a good variety of breads. Everything we tried tasted fresh and flavorful. They also served fruits, sprouts, and a selection of beverages, which was a nice touch.
Special thanks to Bipasha, Rajib, and Mubin. The staff were very kind, responsive, and helpful‚Äîthey took our order promptly and guided us through the options. Overall, a warm and satisfying dining experience!

I recently stayed at the Ibis Hotel and overall, it was a pleasant experience. The location is excellent the rooms were clean and well-maintained, though they are on the smaller side. For a short stay, it was fine, but if you‚Äôre staying longer or have a lot of luggage, space could feel tight.The staff was very polite and helpful, especially at the reception and housekeeping, but nothing too frustrating.Breakfast had a decent varieties

My sincere appreciation for the wonderful breakfast experience. The spread was impressive, with a wide variety of delicious options to choose from‚Äîeverything was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented.

A special thanks to Bibasha for her outstanding service. She was warm, attentive, and made sure we were comfortable and well looked after throughout. Her professionalism and friendly demeanor truly enhanced the overall experience.

Was there for 4 nights, initially booked for 3 and then extended for 1.
The overall stay was good and smooth.
Breakfast spread was ok and the food was better than average.
Room service menu was limited though the food again was better than average.
The service was good want to call out RAM, and Krishna to be exceptional.
Ananta at the reception was also helpful as much as he could.
Yasmin left thugs to be improved upon and expected her to be cordial or courteous.
Process of extension of the room left a lot to be improved. I had to physically come down and check-out and then check-in again.

They claim to be a 4 star hotel but in reality it‚Äôs not worth even 1 star. We had to change 4 rooms before getting a decent one. Either their flush was not working, or fridge was missing, or room was stinking and more. After 1 hour lunch break they gave us a duplex, which was spacious but with no water in washbasin, with broken fridge, no kettle and no tea coffee station, no toilet paper. We had to call staff to fix it and it took another hour. So instead of checking in at 2pm, we actually got our room ready at 5pm.   Moreover, we got a call from their receptionist who asked us to order something from their restaurant, Tandoori Tamasha. Unfortunately, we listened to his advice and as a result we got a wrong order and food came in plastic containers and the bill was presented with container and service charges! It‚Äôs surprising how bad a hotel management can be.

Currently Staying ‚Äì Not a Great Choice for Families

I‚Äôm currently staying at Ilara Hotels & Spa, and honestly, it hasn‚Äôt been a comfortable experience, especially if you're here with family or friends.

We were told that for more than two people, the extra person could sleep in the living room on the sofa. But the living room has no fan or AC, which makes it extremely uncomfortable. The AC and faucet in our main room aren't working properly either.

When we raised these issues, the staff just asked us to adjust for the night, saying they might give us a different room the next day. But today, they‚Äôve changed the story, saying all rooms are the same and only offering a fan as a fix.

We‚Äôve ended up squeezing into one room, trying to manage without basic comfort. So far, it‚Äôs been disappointing. I wouldn't suggest this place if you're looking for a relaxed and hassle-free family stay.

Another disappointment: the ‚Äúspa‚Äù mentioned in the hotel‚Äôs name is currently non-operational for the next two months. If you're booking with the expectation of a relaxing spa experience, you‚Äôll be let down. The name is quite misleading in that sense.

Booked for a suite room, expecting a higher standard of comfort and service. However, I regret to share that the experience did not meet the expected suite standards due to the following issues:
1. The toilet closet was leaking after every flush. While the staff promptly shifted me to another room upon complaint, such issues shouldn't occur in a suite category room.
2. The A/C unit in the room was excessively noisy, indicating a need for proper maintenance and servicing to ensure dust-free, effective cooling.
3. Although the room size was spacious enough to accommodate three people, the room had a persistent unpleasant odor, which affected overall comfort.
4. The bed covers, pillow covers, window curtains, and even the towels had a stale and unpleasant odor. This suggests inadequate laundering or storage.
5. Water supply was disrupted in the middle of the night, and despite multiple calls to reception, no one responded. I had to report it in person to get it resolved.
6. During my three-night stay, no housekeeping staff approached to offer room cleaning or replenishment of basic consumables such as bottled water, toiletries, towels, or tea/milk refills. This lack of daily maintenance was disappointing.
7. The dress & shoe closet was not cleaned properly and did not have any hangers, making it unusable for organizing clothes/shoe during the stay.

The food was absolutely outstanding, and the atmosphere was inviting and vibrant. Every non-vegetarian dish we tried was a true delight, bursting with rich flavors and expertly crafted. It's a must-visit for anyone who appreciates great cuisine. I savored every bite

I had an exceptional stay at Ilara Hotel & Spa. From the moment I arrived, the staff was warm, professional, and accommodating. The room was spacious, spotless. The spa and pool facilities were top-notch, and I appreciated the quiet, luxurious atmosphere throughout. Perfect for a relaxing getaway. Highly recommend!‚Äù

We are leaving today along with the best souvenirs. Great staffs and very helpful and make us feel like your own family. Food was really tasty. Hotel is very good and is highly recommended. Shopping is nearby and good also.
We will definitely come back again.
Thanks to you Mr Riaz and staff members.
Love from us,
Rughoo family,
From Mauritius.

I had an excellent stay at Taz Kamar Inn in Chennai. The hotel is located in the heart of T. Nagar, making it very convenient for shopping and getting around the city. Despite the busy area, the hotel itself is calm, clean, and well-maintained.

The room was spacious, neat, and equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay. The facilities are modern and well-kept, and I truly appreciated the attention to cleanliness throughout the property.

What really made the experience special was the hospitality of the staff. Everyone was very kind, respectful, and attentive. A special thanks to Mr. Abdul Rauf, who went out of his way to make sure all our needs were taken care of. His helpful attitude, professionalism, and warm nature truly stood out and made our stay even more memorable.

Overall, I highly recommend Taz Kamar Inn to anyone visiting Chennai. Whether you‚Äôre here for shopping, business, or family visits, this hotel offers great comfort, value, and excellent service.

I recently stayed at Taz Kamar Inn in T Nagar, Chennai, with my family for 4 days, and we had an excellent experience. The hotel's location is extremely convenient, with shopping areas, Ranganathan Street, and other main shops within walking distance.

The service was superb, and the staff were very helpful throughout our stay. The food at the hotel's restaurant was delicious, adding to the overall pleasant experience.

I highly recommend Taz Kamar Inn to families, business travelers, and groups alike. The hotel's convenient location, excellent service, and great food make it an ideal choice for anyone visiting Chennai.

Superb location, just a short walk to Renganathan Street from the hotel. The hospitality was top-notch, with excellent breakfast and lunch options. The rooms were very comfortable as well. A special thanks to the Manager, Mr. Riyaz, who was always helpful and provided great information. Highly recommended hotel and we will definitely be coming back!

Our group stayed at room 202, 205 & 207. The standard of the rooms were atrocious. The towels were very dirty, had numerous stains and was brownish instead of white due to old age. The soap dispenser was faulty and the replacement never came even after requesting. The room service personnel were requested to clean and replace the towels and water bottles. However, they constantly did not replace these items. Furthermore, the Front Office Manager Mr Riyas was extremely rude and impolite when Ms Mahalechumi spoke with him over the phone. On the final day we checked out at 6am and when we requested for a discount since we were checking out almost half a day before the usual check out time and weren‚Äôt even taking breakfast, they denied a discount although the previous day we were told that there would be a discount. We are very disappointed with the quality of service and standard.

I recently stayed at The Accord Metropolitan in Chennai and had a thoroughly enjoyable experience.

Location:
The hotel is conveniently located right on the main road, adjacent to a flyover, making it easy to access from various parts of the city. Shops, restaurants, and essential stores are all close by, whatever you need is just a short walk away.

Rooms & Amenities:
The rooms are excellent. Even the standard category room is spacious and includes a bathtub, which is a rare offering these days. The room features a 50" TV with OTT platforms already subscribed, a separate coffee table with two chairs, a dedicated work desk with an office chair, and two telephones viz. one near the bed and the other at the work desk.

The hotel provides all essential toiletries and accessories, along with thoughtful amenities like a bathrobe, slippers, iron with ironing board, hairdryer, and a mini bar. Everything is well maintained and neatly arranged.

Dining:
The property houses three restaurants. I tried the breakfast buffet and was amazed by the variety, so many options that I couldn't try everything even over a three-day stay! Each dish I tried was delicious and well-prepared.

On our first evening, we dined at OPM, one of the in-house restaurants. The service was prompt, and the staff was courteous. The food was excellent ‚Äî especially the honey-glazed lotus stem starter, which was a unique and memorable dish for me. The ambience was elevated by live singing and soft music, creating a very pleasant dining experience.

The following evening, we visited the restaurant on the first floor. While the food was fine, the loud sound didn‚Äôt suit our mood, so we didn‚Äôt stay long.

Facilities:
I used the gym and swimming pool, which were well-maintained. I couldn‚Äôt try the spa, sauna, or steam room this time ‚Äî but those are definitely on my list for the next visit.

Final Thoughts:
Overall, The Accord Metropolitan offers a great blend of location, comfort, service, and dining. I highly recommend it for both business and leisure travelers.

One of the kindest and well behaved staff! The location is brilliant, the staff are extremely warm, welcoming, honest and attentive. They are so friendly that we have had long chats with them. They are extremely prompt with solving your needs. The manager provided me with an upgrade way above my paid room category because I was not happy with my previously provided room as that had some maintenance issue. Extremely thankful for this.

Had truly an amazing experience at this hotel with my family. We stayed one night. Booked two rooms. One room was of triple occupancy with same cost and we were provided an extra bed free of cost (which never happens in other hotels). Breakfast was too good! The welcome, in room dining service and the staff, the ambience ‚Äî everything was top-notch. Wish we could stay for a longer period here. Truly a five star hotel.

I was staying here for a total of 9 nights.
The service and hospitality was commendable. I would like to call out the chef . Mr. Guru, who made a different type of dosa for me each day. Making it not just healthy but also catering it to my style and requirements. He also offered packed breakfast when I had an early flight.

Also Valentina one of the staffs there took real good care of me. She made sure there was no monotony and placed small cute stuff in my room on a few days.
They were also quite helpful in many other ways. Great job!

We went here due to sudden change of plans and the previous hotel could not let us stay for a day extra. The breakfast was very scrumptious and had a wide variety, the rooms were clean and well maintained, but the ac sometimes does not work in the night. Atmosphere was really nice there was no disturbance and is in a great location

Beautifully maintained interiors with an elegant lobby and reception. The Club House breakfast buffet is simply outstanding ‚Äî delicious food with a wide, beautifully decorated spread. Rooms are aesthetic and comfortable. Pool and gym under renovation, but overall a fantastic stay for our conference!

I am currently staying here, and right from the entry to my room everything was perfect.
The staff smiling and greeting, helping us till the room.
There are many negative reviews here saying one can here people speaking in adjacent rooms which i found to be baseless.
Yes you may hear doors of other rooms closing but when a heavy door shuts it creates noise.

Everything is just as good as it should be.
All the staff are helpful, warm, friendly and welcoming.

Taj Club House, Chennai, is a nice place to stay. It has clean, well-maintained rooms and friendly staff.

The breakfast buffet was good enough, but I felt the service could have been better. The location is central but a little far from the airport.

Overall, it was a comfortable stay with decent amenities and warm service.

I stayed at Taj Club House from 21st to 24th March 2025.  This was one of the best experience I had ever had in any of the hotels, I have visited so far.
Hospitality of the staff at the hotel was amazing.  Staff at the hotel did not say no to any of our requests.
They arranged for medicine for my daughter in the middle of night for my daughter.  And I am really grateful to them for that.
One day for breakfast we needed Jain Sambar and they quickly got that made for us and best part is that they remembered this request even the next day even when the hotel was completely booked.  I just had breakfast at the hotel and it was delicious and satisfying.
We were gifted a nice souvenir on check out.  Unfortunately, my daughter did not get the toy they generally give as a souvenir but they eventually were happy with the souvenir.

A shout out to all the staff members at the hotel. Sadly I do not remember name of all the staff members but Santhiya G, who had been very kind and helpful with checkout formalities.

The best hotel in its price range. The staff are very helpful and extremely courteous. The rooms are well specified, the restaurants serve a wide range of food. The location is very convenient to access various parts of the city

1. We asked for cold water to be brought to our room. No one showed up. So we called the reception 4 times. Every time someone said that they‚Äôve informed the staff and some is bringing it up right now. No one showed up for 30 minutes. 30 minutes later, we get a call and are told that there is no cold water. This could‚Äôve been done initially. But we simply asked for an ice bucket. No one showed up again. Then a staff showed but with regular bottle. We asked him to bring an ice bucket. We were in a hurry. We had to head out: we only delayed our departure because we were waiting for cold water. But we couldn‚Äôt delay it anymore. Then the staff assured me that he will bring the ice bucket immediately because I made him aware of the urgency. No one showed up yet again for another 10 minutes. So now we headed out. All we wanted was a bottle of cold water on a hot day because we didn‚Äôt have a bottle of water in the fridge in our room.
2. The creamer and coffee was not replenished when the room was cleaned.

All in all the service was poor. For the price that you seek, it‚Äôs not worth it at all. I wouldn‚Äôt book my stay here again

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Pullman Chennai, and I must say, it was a truly lovely experience. The hotel's culinary offerings were exceptional, and the hospitality was outstanding. The buffet service was well-organized, and the staff demonstrated a high level of professionalism. I would particularly like to commend Suraj Singh, whose exceptional guest profiling skills and proactive approach significantly enhanced my stay. His ability to anticipate and meet guests' needs was impressive. Overall, I was thoroughly satisfied with my stay and would highly recommend Pullman Chennai to others. Thank you to the entire team for a wonderful experience.

Oh, I finally slept like a baby after a long time. The hotel‚Äôs brilliant lighting makes one feel fresh, unlike many others with dim settings. The first face I met was Dhayaa at the front desk,  a true asset to Pullman. His warm smile, quick check-in under 2 minutes, and thoughtful follow-ups made me feel instantly at home. The buffet meals were sumptuous, with food and service both outstanding. I‚Äôm a customer for life ‚Äî for me, if it‚Äôs Chennai, it has to be Pullman.

I recently stayed at this hotel for a short official trip, and I was blown away by the exceptional service and stunning room interiors of this hotel! Raghav, from the front desk team, was incredibly helpful and welcoming. The hotel's newly renovated design is breathtaking, with a perfect blend of minimalism and bold pops of color. The liberal use of glass adds a touch of elegance and sophistication. Highly recommend!

I had a very disappointing experience at Pullman Chennai. When I requested a proper meal, the staff directly denied it in a very rude manner. The only option provided was plain dal and rice no vegetables or other choices. Their behavior was extremely discourteous. For a reputed property, such service standards are simply unacceptable.

I will definitely not recommend this hotel to any of my relatives or friends. Pathetic service and zero consideration for guest comfort.

Do not stay here currently - there is very loud construction works going on. Their website discretely mentions this, though says the stop date is the 15th... It's the 17th, and the construction is ongoing. Came here with friends for a wedding.

We honestly would not have stayed here if we'd known it would be this ridiculously loud.

Every day, between 9am and 6pm. Even wearing noise cancelling headphones and with music on you can't get any rest.

They offered us the potential to move rooms, but on the day my partner was unwell and we were checking out the next day anyway. All our friends throughout the hotel had the same issue.

Not good enough for a 5 star hotel.

Other than this, the hotel is lovely. I imagine coming when there's not construction would be a great stay. The staff are wonderful.

Taj used to be associated with luxury. Don't get me wrong, the service and the hospitality is still on point. The people are kind and helpful and get things done.

But wow the infrastructure and the hard product is so poor. The rooms are an afterthought. There's no harmony in the design. There's constant drilling sounds during the day. There's an ugly video door phone inside and very basic lighting controls which makes the whole place feel like a cheap budget hotel

Their Ginger hotels which are a budget hotel have some identity to their design. This is a mess.

Get back to the good days, Taj. Its not too late.

Staff at Anise "Satyajit" got a bright future ahead and an asset for Taj actually young and vibrant. Manager Parul was lovely lovely and chef rajkumar & dayalan do their magic.

Unbeatable hospitality honestly especially the "Anise Restaurant" this guys really really will take care of you, ask for it they will make sure do whatever it takes to make your day..all the staff a big salute. The Chef will do his magic while the staff will sprinkle star dust . It's phenomenal experience.  I really thank all the staff to make my day... I stayed 1night but you really gave me 1000% positive experience.

Staff at pool area, Sathish amazing guy who is really helpful to guide you all the way until you are done with whatever you been doing. Seriously you will be pampered with the hospitality.

Not to forget lobby staff my god with smiles on their faces makes you really calm and enjoy the stay.

Room is perfect... Everything is perfect üíØ

Will come back again 1000% for longer stay.

Our stay at Taj Coromandel was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted with warm hospitality that instantly made us feel at home. The staff are highly experienced, attentive, and always ready to go the extra mile to ensure every guest‚Äôs comfort. Their professionalism is matched by a genuine warmth that truly sets this hotel apart.

The dining experience was equally remarkable. The breakfast spread offered an impressive variety of dishes, each prepared with exceptional taste and quality. Whether it was authentic local flavors or international favorites, every item was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented.

Taj Coromandel doesn‚Äôt just provide accommodation‚Äîit delivers a complete experience of luxury, comfort, and care. I would wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for world-class service and unforgettable memories.
Room is decent, but pricey as compared to other high end hotels. Service is although very good. Need to improve the food quality and should have more variety.

A Pleasant and Hassle-Free Stay I recently spent over 10 nights at Woodlands Inn, Chennai, and had a smooth, comfortable stay throughout. Although the hotel was fully booked, the staff remained exceptionally courteous, prompt, and attentive to every need. Even the housekeeping and support staff were consistently helpful, respectful, and never once showed signs of complaint ‚Äî a real credit to the hotel's service standards. The rooms are compact but thoughtfully designed, clean, and fully functional ‚Äî I faced no issues with amenities, bathrooms, or plug points. Special thanks to Mr. Shashikant and Mr. Mohammed, who provided seamless support from the time of booking to check-out. Their professionalism truly stood out. Overall, a well-run hotel offering great service. Highly recommended.

I stayed here for 12 days with my family, and overall it was a very positive experience. The staff were extremely warm, respectful, and made us feel right at home. They were friendly and accommodating throughout our stay, and especially helpful with our young child, which we really appreciated.

The rooms were clean, well-maintained, and had a pleasant ambience with good lighting. The bathrooms were also in great condition. While the room size felt a bit small for us ‚Äî especially when it came to handling our luggage and unpacking day-to-day ‚Äî it wasn't a major issue, just something to keep in mind if you're staying longer or with kids.

All in all, a comfortable stay with lovely people managing the place. Would definitely recommend for short to medium stays.

Stayed in 4 bed in single room with friends
Good location as it‚Äôs near marina beach
Great service too
The room is very clean and the Ac works really well have no complaints for the price the room is comfortable for night stay.
Tip: better call them directly and book, will save you money rather than booking through booking.com or any other website.
All in all if you‚Äôre looking for a place just to store your things and mostly will be out of the hotel this might be of great value as well.

I stayed here for two days and a night in a economy room. It is a small room but clean and pleasant. The facilities we got for the price we paid is satisfactory.
