The breakfast buffet at Oasis was impressive, with a mix of Indian and continental options, though a bit more variety in North Indian dishes would be great.

The only drawbacks were minor maintenance issues in the bathroom, like a slow-draining sink, and the parking experience could be improved, as I had trouble getting assistance with luggage. The pool and fitness center were well-maintained, adding to the overall comfort. Great value for money and ideal for business travelers or those exploring Chennai. Would definitely return.

Excellent Dinner Experience at Park Plaza OMR

We recently had the pleasure of dining at Park Plaza OMR, and it was an absolutely wonderful experience. From the moment we arrived, the hospitality and attention to detail stood out.

A special mention goes to Mr. Karthik (Banquet Manager) and Mr. Raja (Executive) for their exceptional service. They were warm, attentive, and ensured everything was smooth and enjoyable throughout the evening. Their professionalism and genuine care truly elevated our dining experience.

The ambiance was elegant, the food was delicious with a great variety, and the service made us feel truly valued as guests. We will definitely be returning and highly recommend Park Plaza OMR to anyone looking for quality dining with top-notch service.

Thank you, Park Plaza team, for making our evening so special

The Location is very good near Little mount Metro station. Very easy to reach and locate. The rooms are good and spacious.

Staff is very good and supportive. The yellow colour in their theme is very eye pleasing although some may not like it.

Overall a very good hotel with superb location. Local market is also near by.

The hotel offered a comfortable and clean stay with well-maintained rooms and courteous staff. Check-in was smooth, and amenities like Wi-Fi and room service were reliable. The location was convenient, making travel easy. Overall, a great choice for a short or extended stay. Would definitely consider staying again.

10/10 will come back to this place. Every process was done so smoothly. Staff are very friendly and accommodating to any request. Fast and efficient deliverables. Rooms clean and tidy. Toilet was impeccable. Strongly recommend as it is worth every penny.

The place is near by metro stop itself.
We went to bbq the door buffet the food is medium range only.
Inside we can't sit and eat peacefully is to hot no ac only table fan very worst not good ambience less dish quantity, better to choose any other hotels for buffet.

Have booked the room on single occupancy but they provided a twin bed. Service and location is fine, but we have cancelled one room and asked for even a partial refund but they have completely denied. I was asking for the next booking multiple times but they have not provided the details on time. At the time of check out, they have provided the details of Hyderabad however I had asked for Chennai.

Great stay and rooms with renovated ones including great facilities. Increased Price is around 7-11k which is a bit high. There are much better luxury hotels even greater at that price range. Either they should differentiate price for different types of rooms and packages or reduce a little bit overall.

Restaurant lunch and dinner :
I understand Buffet cost is similar around there, but nothing special and worthy for that cost. Juices and sweets are okay . Non-veg items are not that tasty or good.

The Vivanta Chennai is located on OMR which is close to lots of offices. Hence it is suitable mainly for business travelers.

The rooms are nice, quiet, clean and cozy. However, would have been had they been a bit bigger. There are options for single or double beds. The toilets are good but they lack hair dryers etc. for basic rooms.

The room service and maintenance service is great. The reception and staff is responsive and courteous. The restaurant service was also good.

The breakfast buffet was great in quality, taste and variety. It had lots of Veg and non-veg options. The restaurant area is also good enough for lots of people.

Overall a value for money...

It was a wonderful stay with my family! The hospitality was excellent, service outstanding, and the ambiance truly delightful, we absolutely loved it. A special mention to Mr. Saravana G, Assistant Manager (Food), who went above and beyond to ensure we had a great experience during breakfast. Even though we were late, he made us feel comfortable, ensured our food was served quickly, and interacted so warmly with my kids that it felt just like home. Truly grateful for the care and thoughtfulness!

Amazing Experience at Vivanta Chennai!
My stay at Vivanta Chennai was truly memorable. The staff was warm, courteous, and always ready to help. The rooms were spotless and beautifully designed for comfort. Loved the variety and taste of the food ‚Äì especially the South Indian breakfast! The location is central and convenient. Highly recommended for both business and leisure stays!

The checkin was very smooth, i booked it through MMT. All the employees were courteous and supportive. The hotel was close to the clinic I had to visit. The rooms were big, clean and perfectly lit. Food was varied and tasty. I have loved my stay at this place and look forward to visiting again.
They even accommodated us near lift so my mom could easily walk to it. The hotel has all the facilities as mentioned. Its located in prime IT area.

Stayed here for around 11 nights on a trip to Chennai earlier this year and safe to say I won‚Äôt be staying anywhere else in the future! I love the hospitality of this hotel, and could not recommend it enough. Rooms are spacious and modern, breakfast buffet is great, and the staff go above and beyond to make sure you have a good stay. There‚Äôs a small but functional gym which I used quite a bit, as well as a pool that I didn‚Äôt get a chance to try.

Again, would like to emphasize the staff in this property are amazing and make you feel so welcomed. They even surprised us with a chocolate cake on my final days breakfast, so sweet!

Very NRI and foreigner friendly. Go ahead and book your stay here, you will not regret it!

author_name: Soul On Fire: Travel and Adventure
text:
This 5 star hotel is located on the main road which makes it easy to find. Attended the conference in one of their banquet halls. The staff is well trained and courteous. The banquet hall is spacious and can easily hold a crowd of 100 people. The guests were offered welcome drinks. The arrangements for the presentation were done appropriately . The food served is good and they have a wide spread for both vegetarian and non-vegetarian . They have good options in dessert .
Overall a good experience provided by this property .

I had an amazing experience at Rain Tree Hotel! The food service was exceptional, with staff being incredibly attentive and friendly throughout my visit especially Chef Bhawani, her explanation was quiet polite. The breakfast buffet was a highlight, offering a fantastic variety of dishes that catered to every taste. From fresh fruit and pastries to hot breakfast options, there was something for everyone! The modern yet cozy decor created a warm and welcoming atmosphere. It was the perfect setting to start the day off right. I highly recommend Rain Tree Hotel for anyone looking for great food, outstanding service, and a comfortable, stylish place to stay. Will definitely be coming back!

We had an absolute amazing time at Raintree . The rooms were spacious ..Truely loved the morning buffet, the pairing of flavors is fantastic! It‚Äôs like each ingredient complements the others perfectly. Special mention to chef Bhabani ,skilled and passionate individual who excels in food preparation, and is creative and adaptable, always striving for excellence in both flavor and presentation. üëåüèª
This has been such a wonderful dining experience. Thank you for sharing your amazing cooking with us

During my stay at The Raintree, St. Mary‚Äôs Road, I had a wonderful dining experience, thanks to Chef Bhavani‚Äôs expertise in curating the buffet. Each meal was thoughtfully prepared, with a great variety of flavors that catered to different tastes. One of the standout experiences was trying her special congee drink‚Äîit was warm, soothing, and packed with subtle yet rich flavors, making it a perfect start to the day.

I had the opportunity to meet Chef Bhavani, and her passion for food was evident in the way she spoke about her dishes. She ensured that every item on the buffet was fresh, well-balanced, and beautifully presented. Her dedication and warmth added a personal touch to my stay, making the dining experience truly special.

We stayed at Regenta Central RS, Chennai as a family of three‚Äîmyself, my hubby, my amma, and our baby boy‚Äîand the experience was excellent. The rooms were very clean and comfortable, and the hospitality was at its peak. The breakfast was absolutely top-notch with a great variety. Everything was well maintained and perfect, making our stay very pleasant. We also enjoyed a kind of day-out with shopping at Marina Mall nearby, which made the trip even better. Overall, it was a wonderful and memorable stay. Highly recommended!

We held our children's event at this venue, and it was a great choice. The location was convenient, with ample parking, and it accommodated the number of people we had perfectly. Everything was well taken care of, and the staff was flexible to our needs. Ms. Gayathri and Mr. Allen were exceptionally helpful throughout the process. Ms. Gayathri was friendly, understanding, and quick to respond to any questions we had. We truly enjoyed hosting our event here, and our guests were very satisfied with how everything turned out.

Just awesome experience!
Rooms amazing.
Staff superb: Francis from Guest Experience, Ritika, FOM and other members of the Front Office, Security Officers Vijay & Suresh, Shila from F&B & others, Director of Engineering Baskaran.. hope no name missed out..
Excellent food.
Nice signature scent as you enter the lobby and throughout the hotel.
Experience to live again!

Absolutely pathetic service , extremely disappointed.
We checked in at the lobby , post check-in we were not even offered welcome drink , was brought upon asking.
There was no hair dryer or laundry bag kept in room was brought upon request.
Ordered food in restaurant at 9 50 , which was said would be arrive in 20 mins when called back and enquired the lady bluntly asked ' now only you ordered sir ' in a rude tone , upon going back to restaurant to get to know if food will arrive at 10 35 , food was on the way and bought.
We couldn't sleep the entire night due to external noises from metro work or door closing sounds from adjacent rooms
Only good thing was pool and neatly maintained room.

I recently stayed at Regenta Central RS Chennai OMR and had a pleasant overall experience. From check-in to check-out, the hospitality stood out, making my stay both comfortable and convenient.

The location is ideal for business travelers, especially those with meetings along the OMR corridor. It‚Äôs well-connected and easy to access from major IT hubs and offices. Despite being on a busy stretch, the hotel maintains a quiet, calm atmosphere inside.

Rooms were modern, clean, and well-maintained, with all the essential amenities‚Äîcomfortable beds, crisp linens, a well-stocked minibar, and a clean bathroom. Housekeeping was prompt and did a great job every day. The Wi-Fi speed was reliable, which made working from the room seamless.

The restaurant served a good variety of dishes across cuisines, including some authentic South Indian options. The breakfast buffet was especially noteworthy with its range and freshness. Room service was also timely, and the food arrived warm and well-packed.

The staff at the front desk, housekeeping, and restaurant were courteous, professional, and always ready to help. I had a minor issue with the in-room AC, and the team responded quickly to fix it, which I appreciated.

Facilities like the gym and banquet halls seemed well-equipped and clean, though I didn‚Äôt have time to use them personally. There‚Äôs ample parking as well.

If I were to suggest an area for improvement, it would be to enhance soundproofing between rooms. I occasionally heard hallway noise.

Overall, a solid 4-star property that delivers on expectations. Whether you‚Äôre traveling for business or leisure, Regenta Central RS is a reliable choice in Chennai OMR. I would happily consider staying here again.

Stayed with family for 2 nights. The room was excellent, especially with a small viewing balcony inside the room, giving great views of the road and the nearby lake. The hotel service is quick and they readily accommodated all our requests. The room was clean and hygienic, restaurant food has decent options and staff was very courteous. They even accommodated our late checkout request. The hotel location is central through the city, making it easy to go anywhere for sightseeing.

Perfect place for a quick staycation or even business stays!
The rooms are comfortable with good service.
Their restaurants have wide menu option and variety cuisines. There‚Äôs something for everyone.
Totally love the Sunday brunch!

We had a wonderful vacation at Zone Park Hotel, Chennai. The stay was truly memorable‚ÄîMr. Bala arranged a very pleasant room with a stunning city view that made our experience extra special. The maintenance service by Mr. Nagendran was excellent, and we appreciated the attention to detail throughout our stay. It‚Äôs a great place for families, and I would definitely choose this hotel again for my next vacation.special thanks to Julie she is very friendly. My suggestion to provide hair conditioner and iron box it will be more comfortable for the guests.

This is the best hotel in the town. I didn't expected that it would be such a great in all aspects. It cleared all my doubts. You can stay very happily with the family, friends and even solo. The staff and maintenance is amazing. Especially the front office, restaurant and room service people are exceptional. We booked for one day but continued for 2 more days. It's an exceptional 4 star ‚≠ê hotel that even gives you 5 ‚≠ê experience.

First Experience with This Hotel. Food taste is good . The hotel staff was so courteous and helpful in every way possible The rooms are spacious bathrooms were neat and clean...Room service good. I really recommend.

Zero-Star Experience ‚Äì Misleading Promises and Costly Damage

I am writing this review out of sheer frustration and disappointment with my recent stay at Grand Residence. What was supposed to be a simple, hassle-free experience turned into an absolute nightmare due to gross negligence and misleading assurances.

Despite booking this hotel specifically because of the promised parking availability, I was shocked to find there were no usable parking slots on-site. Instead, I was instructed to leave my car outside the hotel premises ‚Äî an area completely infested with pigeon droppings. It's clear this is a long-standing issue that the management has willfully ignored.

As a direct result of this, my vehicle suffered severe paint damage, with the outer layer peeling off due to the acidic contamination. The repair costs are estimated at INR 20,000, which is almost seven times what I paid for my stay. This is completely unacceptable and reflects a total disregard for guest property and satisfaction.

To say I am disappointed would be an understatement. This experience was not just inconvenient ‚Äî it was financially damaging and deeply frustrating. I would strongly advise others to think twice before trusting the claims made by this establishment.

Avoid at all costs unless you're ready to pay a heavy price ‚Äî quite literally ‚Äî for your stay.

The Experience was  not that good. The Rooms were not up to the mark. The Cleanliness of the Room and Lenin has to be done. The Bathrooms were in Shabby condition. The basic need for towels, Soap and water was not even Provided. The staff were really nice that is why added one more star. The Location is nice.

Utterly disappointing experience

I‚Äôm still trying to process the absolute disaster it was to stay at this place. From the moment I checked in, everything was wrong. I stayed here for 3 days. They asked me to pay for early check-in, later denied breakfast as I reached the restaurant at 10.02 am. Didn‚Äôt even bother to call customer and ask have you had your breakfast. Finally, I have to take a glass of juice on my own. The room landline wasn‚Äôt working and you need to come down to at the reception if you need anything from the housekeeping.

I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this hotel if you are on a business trip.

Mr Jai Ganesh , the front office  Manager was extremely rude . We had our booking for 2 days in double occupancy  which was booked online  , and  we further extended it for another 2 days offline directly with the hotel .( room tariff was 3000 on EP plan ) .

On our 4th day he called , and asked us to check out the room as he got a group booking .

Also , he changed the room tariff from 3000 to 3500/- without prior intimation and was asking us to pay more during checkout .

He was extremely arrogant and was saying word in tamil ( mostly abusive ) which we couldn‚Äôt understand . It was a total mis communication between him and his staffs .

Ambience: Very average.
Facilities:
Hot water facility rating 0 out of 5
Air conditioning rating 5 out of 5
Complimentary breakfast 4.5 out of 5
Parking 0 out of 5
Communicate to reception or restaurant

Never knew this hotel.
Was looking for a good banquet Hall for a function in the vicinity of T Nagar and found this place Google search.
But one call to their reception was enough for me to decide what sort of place and service it would be. The receptionist who picked up the call made me wait for nearly five minutes to tell me that no one is available at the banquet section?
Why can't businesses like this have the basic understanding of creating that first impression at least.
They will only keep losing customers like this?.
I was in this hotel and used the laundry. They wrote the blue pink in my white shirt which cant be acceptable. My white shirt is valuable and no ways to make it white again.

Terrible experience ‚Äì absolutely not worth four stars!

We stayed here for one night ‚Äì and that was already one too many. Upon arrival, our driver was spoken to in a very rude manner and was not allowed to park the car at the hotel. There are also no facilities for drivers to stay overnight, which is something many travelers in India would reasonably expect.

The rooms were clean ‚Äì and that‚Äôs the only positive point we can mention. The rest of the stay was extremely disappointing. Major construction work is currently going on, causing a lot of noise, dust, and an overall unpleasant atmosphere. This was never communicated to us beforehand ‚Äì very dishonest towards guests.

Breakfast was a disgrace for a hotel that claims to be four-star quality. The so-called "continental" options were limited to some toast, butter, and fruit. The Indian breakfast had more variety, but most items smelled sour and seemed far from fresh. In the bar, we even saw cockroaches. The central air conditioning made such loud noise that sleeping was very difficult.

To make things worse, we were charged an additional 1800 INR for a simple camp bed for our driver ‚Äì someone whose good night's rest is crucial for our safety.

We understand that renovations may be necessary, but communicate this clearly and temporarily close your doors if you cannot guarantee basic comfort. Right now, you are delivering an experience unworthy of the term "hotel."

Do not book here. It‚Äôs absolutely not worth your money.

A Room with Drilling and Hammering noise, change of room declined on the guise that the repairs were of emergency and Will stop by evening, continuing all three days, stretched through evenings. Restaurant only for breakfast and otherwise its only room service. You don't get what you choose from menu, but get only what they have

Regret my choice
Went for batchmates meet up had lunch good food buffet everything was in order the only problem is seating i would to add more tables and chairs for people to sit and eat

I would like to sincerely appreciate banquet live counter Chef for his exceptional courtesy and professionalism. From the moment we interacted, his warm attitude and respectful demeanor truly stood out. He not only prepared delicious dosa with great attention to detail but also made sure to personally check on guest preferences and satisfaction.

His willingness to listen, accommodate special requests, and ensure a pleasant dining experience reflects his genuine care for hospitality. It‚Äôs rare to see such humility and grace in a professional kitchen, and Chef sets a great example.

Thank you, Chef, for your kindness and the memorable experience. Your courtesy made a big difference!

I must say, the check-in experience was quite disappointing. The receptionist acted rather arrogantly, as if she were doing us a favor by letting us check in. The attitude and expressions were unnecessary and unwelcoming -- this definitely needs improvement.
Other staffs were good

Food:
We ordered lunch and dinner from the hotel and, honestly, it was below average. I‚Äôd recommend avoiding meals here altogether.
The breakfast buffet was decent, though probably the only saving grace foodwise.

Safety Concern :
This is something I really want to highlight.
Around 1AM, someone rang the bell claiming to be from the restaurant and asked if we had requested food to be reheated. I clearly hadn‚Äôt made any such request. He double-checked the room number and left, but the whole thing felt very fishy and unsettling.

I reported this to the reception. They said they would look into it,
I‚Äôm still unsure if it was a genuine mistake or something more serious --either way, this kind of experience is not acceptable, Please be cautious if you‚Äôre planning to stay here.

The overall experience was far from satisfying

I had a very disappointing experience during my recent stay at your hotel. The services were extremely slow and unprofessional. The rooms and overall property looked nothing like the photos shown on your website ‚Äî which feels misleading.

The food quality was strictly average and certainly did not justify the prices charged. What made the experience even worse was the behavior of the front desk staff ‚Äî their attitude was rude and unwelcoming, as if guests are staying free of cost.

Overall, it was a regrettable stay and I would not recommend this hotel to others. A serious improvement is needed in service, hospitality, and honesty in representation.
Amazing and spacious rooms. We got luckily to get a room with a huge balcony facing the pool. The pool and the gym is also good. The complimentary BF was good.

During my official visit to Chennai , i had the opportunity to stay in this hotel for two nights. The Hotel is located in the heart of the city very close to Anna Salai  n Spencer Plaza. It has got a well maintained swimming pool and food is good n tasty. The breakfast Buffet has lots of variety. Enjoy my stay ....wished they had a smoking rooms inside the hotelüòâ

Convenient location‚Ä¶ that about it! That‚Äôs all to it. Service is terrible! Staff (including managerial) is unaccommodating & unwelcoming. They do not honor made by the guests any requests. Hygiene is of concern. Housekeeping do not replace bed sheets & towels. Any requests made to housekeeping takes 1 - 2 hours I.e. if they honor your request. We had to wait about 7 hours once to get extra towels & bed sheets. A hotel running out of towels is unheard of. We requested for an ironing board & never got one at all. The house keeping staff‚Äôs attitude is as if they are doing you a favor. WiFi doesn‚Äôt work. No complaint gets resolved, even after complaining several times. If you‚Äôre looking for good service‚Ä¶. look elsewhere.

I have been staying here on my Chennai trips for the past 3 times and i thoroughly enjoyed it. Yes breakfast is vegetarian with no eggs but the friendly staff good service and location more than makes up for it. It is connected to Express Mall do we could do our shopping have our food be it rain or shine. I would specially like to commend Gopi, Sathish and Jennifer for their excellent service. Hope to come back soon

We generally had a good experience at this semi cosy house. Neatly maintained property. Location is perfect as one of its door/gate opens to Express Avenue Mall which makes it all the more convenient. Beds were very comfortable and rooms had all the amenities.

One area of improvement would be "Breakfast Selection", which could have more varieties.
Please also be reminded that they offer vegan diets only.

Disappointing 4-Star Experience

I chose this hotel for a Drop Box appointment, expecting quality given its 4-star rating and location within the Great Express Avenue Mall. Unfortunately, my stay was subpar. The hotel's condition was concerning - dirty bathrooms, unclean towels and pillows, and lobby carpets with a strong unpleasant smell. Despite bringing the carpet issue to the manager's attention, it remained unaddressed. The only positives were the welcoming staff at the entrance and their help with our bags. Breakfast was just okay. Given the hotel's state and lack of attention to guest concerns, I'd say it falls short of even a 2-star standard. Not recommended for those seeking cleanliness and good service.

Absolutely unacceptable experience. A friend of ours made a confirmed booking for multiple rooms through official Booking.com. The hotel shamelessly breached the contract by canceling all our rooms without any valid reason and at the last minute. To make matters worse, they‚Äôve completely disappeared ‚Äî ignoring all calls and messages, refusing to take responsibility or even communicate. This is not just unprofessional, it‚Äôs cowardly. We were left stranded and extremely distressed. Avoid this hotel at all costs ‚Äî they clearly have no respect for their guests, bookings, or basic decency.

Located inside Phoenix Mall, If you want to get a cab you have to walk out of the mall with all your luggage. Rooms designed well, but comfort is poor. There is not even a single mirror inside the room, so ladies will find it difficult to dress up, in fact they have to go to the toilet cum bath to dress up. The funny thing is the corridor is walled on both sides with mirrors. But one cannot dress in the corridor.

Stayed here twice in the last 2 years and the quality has degraded significantly over time. The rooms are okay but the are washrooms aren‚Äôt clean and maintained anymore. Most of the taps and faucets hardly have any water coming through.
One major problem with this hotel is the parking. If you are not diligent about collecting the parking coupon and handing it at the mall parking exit, money will be automatically debited from your Fastag and the hotel takes no responsibility for it. We were unaware of this the first time, nor did the hotel inform us. So more than ‚Çπ800 got deducted from our Fastag and the hotel refused to provide any sort of compensation. Too disappointing.
Another thing to be mindful of is your ID proofs after check-in. The staff tends to forget to return them, and we noticed they had a huge stack of unclaimed IDs. So, be sure to collect yours before heading to your room.
Coming to the good part, the breakfast at Annam Cafe is great. Rooms have all the amenities. The hotel is designed in a unique and interesting fashion - truly a ‚ÄúDesign Hotel‚Äù, lol.
Overall, not recommended for a stay anymore as the tariff is quite high for the current quality and maintenance.

Terrible experience overall. The hotel is inside Phoenix Marketcity, and there‚Äôs no proper direction or staff to help with parking. Reception was unmanned when we arrived ‚Äî check-in got delayed. They didn‚Äôt mention the parking pass, so we got stuck at the toll gate for 20 minutes.

Room wasn‚Äôt cleaned after we went out ‚Äî we had to ask at reception. Only one set of toiletries for two people. Gym pass given without any directions ‚Äî later found out it‚Äôs inside the mall. TV didn‚Äôt work on the second day, and the only response was ‚Äúmaintenance hasn‚Äôt come.‚Äù

Breakfast was very basic and limited ‚Äî definitely not what you expect from an expensive hotel. Poor service, poor communication, and no attention to detail. Not worth the money at all.

The rooms are not as expected. The Purple Chameleon, downstairs, has the music on until late, so if you're an early bird, you don't stand a chance. Definitely not value for money, but the staff are incredibly helpful and polite. 10/10 dor the reception team and the breakfast staff.
Location was perfect for what I needed

This hotel is right on top of Phoenix mall. I liked the design here but it lacks function in many places and as the forgotten saying in architecture - form follows function. The standard room has a highly inaccessible area for the A/C controller and the tea/ coffee, milk sachets. The rooms could have been a little bit more tidier, the air conditioners had dust in them.  The third floor is where the cafe is and due to lack of ventilation in the passageway, there was a strong stench from the kitchen in the passageway (I dont think this is a cause of concern and it is just particular to my stay)
The reason I am giving 3.5/5 stars is because of the location with direct lift to the mall through Purple Chameleon restaurant, the discount you can get at this restaurant if you stay at the hotel and the courteous staff who prepared us breakfast before 7 AM (breakfast buffet starts at 7:30 AM ).
Its 25 minutes from the airport with moderate traffic and is a pleasant stay. Not bad value for money given how much other hotels but places like Southern comfort and Mount manor are cheaper but I have read that traffic noises are a bother in both of those places.

I recently stayed here and had an average experience overall. The biggest downside for me was that outside food isn‚Äôt allowed, which was quite inconvenient. The stay itself was decent, but definitely overpriced for the quality of service provided. Rooms are descent but not worth the money. Breakfast complimentary was provided but not great.

I‚Äôd only recommend this place if you don‚Äôt mind spending a lot on something that doesn‚Äôt really offer value for money. Location is the only advantage.
Last month we conducted birth party in red maple it very satisfying food was very tasty  and delicious.   the rooms are so clean and neat happy to stay  in this hotel thankyou for making us satisfied

Hi guys
If u wanna SPOIL ur party book n Maple tree hotel. Last month we arranged our children 1st bday function. Party wnt disaster. No proper Air Conditioning, no proper lift etc etc.. Smoke came from Ac n de banquet hall, our guests were went out because they thought it's fire.
We informed the manager in charge of the hall nd he promised for compensation for our losses. However, I realised later that the staff, including the manager of banquet hall were pathetic and lacked servicing skills. There was no proper response, no responsibility and good for nothing!  They didn't even apologised us. I think They will apologised in Google review only . DONT CHOOSE MAPLE TREE HOTEL UNLESS U WANNA MAKE A BAD PARTY.

Pathetic service.Rooms have indequate lights.AC is ok types.Washroom is horrible and on top of that service lift functioning is highly unpredictable.I will NOT AT ALL recommened.Location is good but finally the stay should be pleasant for the price paid.Hotel guys there are lots of areas to improve upon pls do it your biz will flourish.Thoughtful customers do not mind paying extra money for comfort price

My experience at Maple Tree Hotel was disappointing. The cleanliness of the rooms was not up to the mark, and the service was very poor. Despite multiple calls, basic requests like coffee were ignored. The AC wasn‚Äôt working properly, making the stay uncomfortable. Additionally, the hotel has only one lift for 5 floors, leading to long wait times. Needs significant improvement in both service and facilities.

I had a excellent stay in the hotel . Rooms were excellent with neat and clean . Room services were provided on timely manner. Safe and secure with automatic smartcard. Base locking system which makes it more secure. There was laundry, resturant good was good but could be better. For party and occasional drinker , there is a nice bar which can be availed for hangout. Very friendly staff and helpful . Actually I exceeded for couple of hours of my stay due to cab issue . So the hotel staff supported in getting a good cab and didn't charge extra for that extra hour stay.

My stay at the hotel was a pleasant one with large rooms and great view. The rooms were cleaned and maintained neat on a daily basis. Food we ordered was also good.
The areas of improvement would be to replace the old  TV to a smart TV.
Room service guys were very respectful and provided the required things. The front office guys were also very helpful and received us well. Overall it was a very pleasant stay and would definitely recommend it all .

Our stay at Park Sabari was not just pleasant‚Äîit was truly heartwarming. What made it stand out for me was the way we were cared for, especially when it came to food. My parents are elderly and have multiple dietary restrictions, which often makes travelling and dining out a bit challenging for us as a family. We were unsure of how things would be managed, but what happened next genuinely moved us.

Mr. Kartick, who looked after us during our stay, was nothing short of a blessing. From the very beginning, he noticed the specific needs of my parents and took it upon himself to ensure they were comfortable and well taken care of. He didn‚Äôt just do his duty‚Äîhe went above and beyond, often checking in personally, remembering their preferences, and serving food that was not only suitable for their health but also brought them a sense of home and comfort.

It felt like he wasn‚Äôt just serving guests‚Äîhe was serving with care, empathy, and a big heart. Watching my parents enjoy their meals without worry, feeling relaxed and nurtured, meant the world to me. It‚Äôs not something we experience often, and I‚Äôll always carry that with me.

To Mr. Kartick and the team at Park Sabari‚Äîthank you for not just providing service, but for offering genuine kindness. You made us feel at home, and for that, we‚Äôre truly grateful.
